lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll be at Aeor in a day and a half.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They want to bring back the Somnovem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a hyphen in that bit, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will you meet us? Will you help us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He ain't comin'. He ain't comin'.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But if we go to him, I'm here for that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have him on our side and try to help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We would have to convince the Tomb Takers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but the plan didn't work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, so what's another plan to convince them to go to the southeast side?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We go away and they chase us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (chuckles) Because we have a thing that they need.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We think they are. They could be lying to us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we go in the middle of the night, the rest of us would be exhausted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We go now, we leave now, we just go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we go, we wait a couple hours until they're out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm starting a Commune spell as this conversation's happening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What difference does it make? Lucien never sleeps anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many more messages can you cast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who knows if we tried to do anything, they're going to chase us, we might have to fight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So where did he say the entrance was again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could try and rest and enact this plan tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So will they, and you guys won't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That tea had something in it, a kick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we are going to just chance that we can find this entrance, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a big gamble for a tiny payout.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll probably be hitting my trance pretty soon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought we were going to be trying to find Essek's outpost.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But he said he's not leaving.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the difference between the northwest corner and the eastern outpost could be like six to eight hours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And maybe there is some benefit to having him join us because he's so talented, but what is to be gained by diverting away? Because we don't know if he's going to come.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look up at that, for the last look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you like to ask?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lucien Nonagon, is this second entrance that he's been talking about actually where he said it was, to the northwest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get a stronger warm breeze that blows past your back over your shoulder in the direction that you're facing, interpreting it as affirmation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does he need all of us alive for what he plans to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The breeze becomes extremely icily cold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does he need all of us alive when we arrive?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was the last one again? I'm sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he need us alive when we arrive?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does he need us alive when we get there? And the answer is no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you got a confirmation on northwest side?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is-- he was not lying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have five questions, or is that Speak With Dead?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three, five is Speak With Dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He doesn't need all of us and he doesn't need all of us alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But he might need some of us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But does he need some of us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did he know you had angel blood?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know, I don't think it's...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So again, what's to be gained if we were to collapse this entrance that he's hoping to take? That it would force him to another one where--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like that would only be useful if we needed to buy time to get Essek on our side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which I don't think we're going to get.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's a good call to talk to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we're along for the ride, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've been talking around this for two days now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go right now or go with them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, go with them, get a night's sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Out of the corner of your eye, you see apparate once more that same orb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Several cats do now approach you at my telepathic bidding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go to bed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, before we go to bed, I wouldn't mind reaching out to Yudala Fon, if we're about to crash for the night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay well, we're being, you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hope I get to go to sleep tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I was just let them know that--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just physical locks? Or magical, 9th-level, wizard locks?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've never brought anyone in here that I didn't trust.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we all sleep in the same room together?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm wondering if we all might.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, just us, instead of in our individual rooms.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we at least bring some--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we could get those from the floor below.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could sleep where we slept with the Yetis or we could sleep in Veth and my chambers with the laboratory in between--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I'm sending a message to Yudala.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So any pertinent information they could deliver would be nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing about that didn't make sense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: previously, has information on what the Cognouza is."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We know that we know... it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To me that tells us, we might see friends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we want to find out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That could be the gnome that we scared off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we want to figure out who the operative is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it doesn't mean that the operative's there now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It means the operative had previously gone and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It says "an operative by the ruins."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- who had been by the ruins.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry. Doesn't mean where we're going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, let's make a fort. A pillow fort.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are arranging in which room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll bring some bed mats, but on the floor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I usually sleep in the chair that's in there anyway, so.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. We could also do the-- like Charlie and the Chocolate Factory? You know, where--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, I have a whole rant on that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The room of requirement that just offers up what you need and get some bed rolls and blankets and pillows and take a couple of trips back and forth with Veth's help.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just so we have something to sleep on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys go ahead and set up in Yasha's room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go ahead and eventually find yourself asleep unless you have any other business to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we all in for the night? Does anyone need to leave this room for anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on, let me go pee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought that was out-- I feel more comfortable peeing in my own room. Hold on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think she's going number two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay and now I came back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Lucien on his own, just walking around and just looking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can play a fun trick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to go? Do you want to see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you being deceptive in any way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Polymorph on both of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: ♪ I can show you the world ♪

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I then run off and show him the little doors so we can run around the tower as cats.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doesn't that let him into our room? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everyone has complete privacy and they are in control.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the beard makes it creepier! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can see you when you're asleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lucien gives chase for a little bit and then seems to be preoccupied with his own wanderings in cat form for a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run up behind him and tried to tell him that it only lasts for an hour, but all I'm doing is meowing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's been gone for so long! We need to send out a party.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, how long do you wander about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll wander around with him for 30 minutes and then--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe she's just taking a shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did say I needed privacy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just fills the chamber pot all in one go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think 20 minutes into that, I would have spoken to Frumpkin and put out an APB amongst the cats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a blue cat and when I turned Lucien into a cat I polymorphed him into a little red cat with little purple and teal swirls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oddly enough, though not of your implementation, the cat has visibly nine eyes that are red that glow through the fur across the cat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then you can see him growing a little more curious to wander on his own as you follow up behind and right then Frumpkin arrives and approaches to go, (meowing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (meows) And goes and is trying to lead you back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (indifferent meow) And he darts off into the tunnels on his own.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that one internet cat that goes-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When do you turn back into a cat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I don't know, because if I turn back into me, does that cancel it on--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll let you cancel one if you don't wish to cancel the other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll cancel myself when I get back in the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll (pat pat) on the little tunnel door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, it was that bad, you had to come in through another door, huh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (meows) (poofing) I was a cat. Lucien's a cat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. No, I turned to Lucien into a cat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, yes, that's foolish of me, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so did you do your poo?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not even as a cat? Because it's free rein when you're a cat here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You need a litter box, you can't just pee anywhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can see them every 20 yards inside the tunnels.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just-- this place would smell so bad! Is it magic fey pee?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or, you know we could just let him be a cat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, are we in here for the night?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I say: This is wild. You want to see something funny? And I open the little doorway and there's, like, four cats like-- pressed in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I have just clogged all of five and the tops of four and three leading into five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell connection you have with Lucien's Polymorph ends prematurely on its own.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's not a cat anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because he can cancel that shit at any moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's pretty cool; he can do just about anything, it seems like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You and I need to rest because--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to sit up against the door and just sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh man, I'm going to get straight eight hours of sleep? This is a fantasy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you guys doing the sleepies with the feets, four people?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: In the bed? Four people on the bed?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All the ladies? Nah, jump in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing seems to catch your attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the beginning, it's that tension of knowing that the enemy is in the house that leads to an uncomfortable rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's coming from inside the house!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through the challenging wrestling tonight and sleep--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you look around in this darkness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're unaware of each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Welcome." The eye closes, and you wake up, both shooting up at the exact same time within the chamber. (gasping) Catches your attention, Fjord, immediately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I start trying to copy as much as I could from memory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you start writing it down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wanted to ask also: If I think back to what we looked at, which is hazy, but does it make any more sense?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're looking over towards Beauregard and she's sketching, you see the back of the hand that's holding the book.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take her hand and twist so that hers is on top of the back facing up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the back of your left hand, you see an identical red eye on the skin to Lucien's.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your arms, he had one on his arm?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the last place you look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Somnovem's like, "Oh, this was a bad idea."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sitting there holding the Star Razor like--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Picks up Caduceus' staff and is like-- I do actually-- Ichabod Crane pulls off his shirt and I start looking at bare chest and arms to see everywhere and turning around in front of Beauregard and Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Caleb's pulling back his robes, you can see on the right shoulder just above where the bicep and deltoid meet, you see a similar single red eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you begin to come to, hearing the shifting and ruckus and conversation and tension in the room is immediately accessible to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wish I had that spell now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look down at my notes. What did I draw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see-- you recall writing your dream, the words of it, and you look down at the page again and it is just scratches and lines and nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You asked to read the book.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if it's good that we did it together or bad that we did it together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Welcome to the Eyes of Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll be in all the nine groups.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a starting fee of 199 gold for the first six months.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: By buying these amount of books.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you have to recruit only ten people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to kill Caleb and Beau now, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Matt, this is more than I could've ever asked for.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You essentially turned the wizard and the monk on us? Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or made them more powerful, maybe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The one who's obsessed with gaining control of his domain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did look at it together.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We blessed and we guided and we didn't go like, "Maybe one of you goes first?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we kind of knew, could have-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey man, you read the Elder Sign. (chuckles)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to keep playing. I want to find out more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, I know. Well, soon enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get one step ahead of him, learn something he didn't know, and instead we stared into the Necronomicon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up from that revelation next time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much, and is it Thursday yet? Good night.
